Description:
EXTREMELY RARE OPPORTUNITY TO OWN A SLICE OF WATERFRONT HEAVEN!
Far from the madding crowds, there is a little patch of waterfront paradise waiting for you. Less than an hour's drive south-east of Melbourne, at the northernmost tip of Western Port Bay sits the coastal hamlet of Cannons Creek. Set on nearly 1000sqm, this rural haven is one of only 12 properties backing directly onto the beautiful Rutherford's Inlet, where twin boat ramps and unimpeded water views await. However, this is much more than a standard sea change, it's a rare opportunity to secure that perfect country getaway you've been dreaming of. The contemporary designed 2 bedroom (another space may be converted to a 3rd bedroom) house is cute & stylish, with a light filled family room, spacious open plan kitchen/dining space and a separate study/office. With modern fittings and quality flooring throughout, and plenty of room on site for parking, this charming, low maintenance, beautifully located home is ready to go. Or, if you prefer, ready to renovate, redevelop or simply relax. (After all, it's your perfect life.) With access to the World Heritage listed Ramsar Wetlands and the gourmet pleasures of The Mornington Peninsula on your doorstep, this is nothing less than a slice of Aussie nirvana; either as is, or however you dream it. Because, out here, you have space. Are you ready to explore?
This unique and secluded coastal village is only 45 minutes (approximately) drive from the heart of Melbourne and close to the Eastern suburbs.
Please note that due to COVID19 Restrictions, all inspections will be of private nature. Please call Lyn Castillo on 0414 575 349 or by email. Social distancing and strict precautionary measures (wearing of gloves, facial masks, sanitisers) will be in place for everybody's safety.
